scripts.dockerbuild: docker build -t serco/dad2-backend:0.0.1 . ; docker rm -f dad2-backend ;  docker run --name dad2-backend -p 2000:1000 -d -it serco/dad2-backend:0.0.1 ; docker rmi $(docker images -f 'dangling=true' -q) --force; docker logs --follow dad2-backend
scripts.server-docker: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose up
scripts.server-docker-detached: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose up &
